column2: Today we live in an era where digital communication plays a central role in our lives. Technology companies with the Internet and telephony industry develop technologies that affect every area of our lives.
The development of new technology: cloud computing, artificial intelligence, learning machines, robotics - these are all part of the new technologies that change the way we work and live.
We are living in an era where information becomes a central force. Many companies and influential entities use data to manage their business and make smart decisions.
Social platforms have become a part of our daily lives, enabling instant communication and sharing of experiences around the world.

Ideas such as exercise, healthy food, a new perception of doctors and therapists, and the current knowledge about self-development and personal development are topics that raise their heads in this period.
